short_summary: Technical writing services for MS Dynamics and SharePoint applications
description: The National Research Council (NRC) Industrial Research Program (IRAP) requires professional services to document new features and functionality for various MS Dynamics and SharePoint applications.
full_summary:
# Notice of Solicitation

## Solicitation Title:

Improve Technical Writing Services for Dynamics and SharePoint Applications

## Solicitation Overview

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) Industrial Research Program (IRAP) invites interested parties to submit proposals for professional technical writing services to document new features and functionalities for various Microsoft Dynamics and SharePoint applications.

## Tender Advisory

* **Solicitation Number:** 23-58136
* **Publication Date:** December 21, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 22, 2024 at 14:00:00 (EST)
* **Tender Status:** Expired

## Procurement Overview

This procurement seeks to engage a skilled technical writer to provide high-quality documentation for new features and functionalities of various MS Dynamics and SharePoint applications. The selected contractor will be responsible for producing accurate, clear, and concise technical documentation to meet the client's requirements.

## Request for Proposal (RFP) Criteria

The evaluation of proposals will be based on a combination of technical merit and price. The selected contractor will be chosen based on their expertise, experience, and ability to meet the client's requirements.

## Important Information

* The procurement is restricted to Canadian companies.
* The contract will be performed in English and/or French, depending on the client's preference.
* The selected contractor will be required to provide regular updates and meet the client's deadlines.

## Proposal Submission Guidelines

Feel free to contact Annette Driscoll at (506) 377-9104 or annette.driscoll@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca for more information on the tender process.

## Tender Documents and Supporting Files

Download the tender package, including the Request for Proposal (RFP), applicable terms and conditions, and any supporting documents from the following links:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28258/23-58136_npp_b.14-technical-writer_revision-december-22%2C-2023.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28258/23-58136_apm_b.14.-redacteur-technique_revision_le-22-decembre%2C-2023.pdf

Best of luck for You.

#Note -: You can still maintain original text wording using markdown formatting, Meaning you are rewriting, rephrasing, wording-out tones from original document and still rewriting in same bill
